data.title: The Court of Master Sommeliers Americas
data.meta_description: Members A bolded name denotes a Master Sommelier eligible to teach, examine and participate in Court of Master Sommeliers, Americas programming. To be eligible for participation, members must sign the CMS-A Code of Ethics and complete the training modules for diversity and harassment in the workplace. Individuals who have passed…
data.meta_site_name: The Court of Master Sommeliers Americas
data.text:
Please confirm you want to block this member.

You will no longer be able to:

See blocked member's posts

Mention this member in posts

Invite this member to groups

Please allow a few minutes for this process to complete.

DO NOT create a new account if you have ever logged in before.

Select “Login” from the top right of the home page

Select “Forgot password” from the login page

Submit your email address, and you will be sent a reset link

If you do not receive an email, please check your spam folder

Please reach out if you need help at info@mastersommeliers.org. Thank you!
